TASK: Change power settings
DOMAIN: settings

STEPS:
1. Open the Start menu
   REASONING: Need to access the Start menu to navigate to Windows Settings
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.02, y=0.98)

2. Wait for Start menu to appear
   REASONING: Allow the Start menu animation to complete before proceeding
   ACTION: WAIT(1.0)

3. Click on Settings icon
   REASONING: Windows Settings app is required to access power settings
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.08, y=0.88)

4. Wait for Settings app to load
   REASONING: Allow the Settings application window to fully open and render
   ACTION: WAIT(1.5)

5. Click on System category
   REASONING: Power settings are located within the System category in Windows Settings
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.15, y=0.15)

6. Wait for System settings to load
   REASONING: Allow the System settings page to display its options
   ACTION: WAIT(1.0)

7. Click on Power & battery option
   REASONING: This section contains all power-related settings including sleep, screen timeout, and power plans
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.15, y=0.35)

8. Wait for Power & battery settings to load
   REASONING: Allow the power settings page to fully render with all available options
   ACTION: WAIT(1.0)

9. Scroll down to view additional power options
   REASONING: Some power settings may be below the fold and require scrolling to access
   ACTION: SCROLL(direction="down")

10. Click on Screen and sleep settings dropdown
    REASONING: Need to expand this section to modify when the screen turns off and when the device goes to sleep
    ACTION: CLICK(x=0.50, y=0.45)

11. Wait for dropdown options to appear
    REASONING: Allow the expanded settings options to display
    ACTION: WAIT(0.5)

12. Click on "When plugged in, turn off my screen after" dropdown
    REASONING: To modify the screen timeout setting when the device is plugged in
    ACTION: CLICK(x=0.70, y=0.50)

13. Select desired timeout value (e.g., 15 minutes)
    REASONING: Set the screen timeout to the preferred duration
    ACTION: CLICK(x=0.70, y=0.56)

14. Task completed
    REASONING: Power settings have been successfully changed as requested
    ACTION: DONE()

EXPECTED_OUTCOME: The Windows Settings app should be open to the Power & battery section, with the power settings modified according to user preferences. The screen timeout setting will be updated to the selected value, and the changes will be automatically saved.
